item.title: Solr with MySQL
item.description: I work in a Research Institute. My job there involves making Software Systems that work with biological sample data. About six months ago, we started developing systems that involved doing high level searches on the biological sample data we have stored in numerous MySQL databases. These high level searches were being done directly on MySQL with the assistance of wildcards and a bit of cleaning. To be honest, the searches weren’t really working like we wanted them to.
